type: Legendary Creature – Human Warlock Knight Noble
rules_text:
Menace
[i]Malefic Aura[/i] – At the beginning each opponent's precombat main phase, that player mills two cards.
[i]Lifetaker[/i] – Whenever one or more creatures are put into an opponents graveyard from anywhere, you gain 1 life.
[i]Dragon Vein[/i] – {3}{B}{B}: Creatures target player controls must block this turn.
